<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Receiver data webhooks"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"event"}
  path={"webhook"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



We send a webhook for every request made to the Receiver's Data endpoints. The status might be:
* PROCESSING: the request was successfully created, and is being processed;
* COMPLETED: the request has returned the data successfully;
* ERROR: the request has returned an error.

The webhook request has data about the consulted information, following the table:

| RequestType | CanonicalRequestPath |
|-------|:-------------|
|GetResources|/resources/\{versionPath\}/resources|
|GetPersonalIdentifications|/customers/\{versionPath\}/personal/identifications|
|GetPersonalQualifications|/customers/\{versionPath\}/personal/qualifications|
|GetPersonalFinancialRelations|/customers/\{versionPath\}/personal/financial-relations|
|GetBusinessIdentifications|/customers/\{versionPath\}/business/identifications|
|GetBusinessQualifications|/customers/\{versionPath\}/business/qualifications|   
|GetBusinessFinancialRelations|/customers/\{versionPath\}/business/financial-relations|   
|GetCreditCardsList|/credit-cards-accounts/\{versionPath\}/accounts|   
|GetCreditCardsAccountIdentification|/credit-cards-accounts/\{versionPath\}/accounts/\{creditCardAccountId\}|   
|GetCreditCardsAccountLimits|/credit-cards-accounts/\{versionPath\}/accounts/\{creditCardAccountId\}/limits|   
|GetCreditCardsAccountTransactions|/credit-cards-accounts/\{versionPath\}/accounts/\{creditCardAccountId\}/transactions|   
|GetCreditCardsAccountTransactionsCurrent|/credit-cards-accounts/\{versionPath\}/accounts/\{creditCardAccountId\}/transactions-current|   
|GetCreditCardsAccountBills|/credit-cards-accounts/\{versionPath\}/accounts/\{creditCardAccountId\}/bills|   
|GetCreditCardsAccountBillTransactions|/credit-cards-accounts/\{versionPath\}/accounts/\{creditCardAccountId\}/bills/\{billId\}/transactions|   
|GetAccountsList|/accounts/\{versionPath\}/accounts|   
|GetAccountIdentification|/accounts/\{versionPath\}/accounts/\{accountId\}|   
|GetAccountBalances|/accounts/\{versionPath\}/accounts/\{accountId\}/balances|   
|GetAccountTransactions|/accounts/\{versionPath\}/accounts/\{accountId\}/transactions|   
|GetAccountTransactionsCurrent|/accounts/\{versionPath\}/accounts/\{accountId\}/transactions-current|   
|GetAccountOverdraftLimit|/accounts/\{versionPath\}/accounts/\{accountId\}/overdraft-limits|  
|GetLoansContractsList|/loans/\{versionPath\}/contracts|  
|GetLoanContractIdentification|/loans/\{versionPath\}/contracts/\{contractId\}|  
|GetLoanContractWarranties|/loans/\{versionPath\}/contracts/\{contractId\}/warranties|  
|GetLoanContractPayments|/loans/\{versionPath\}/contracts/\{contractId\}/payments|  
|GetLoanContractScheduledInstallments|/loans/\{versionPath\}/contracts/\{contractId\}/scheduled-instalments|  
|GetFinancingsContractsList|/financings/\{versionPath\}/contracts|  
|GetFinancingContractIdentification|/financings/\{versionPath\}/contracts/\{contractId\}|  
|GetFinancingContractWarranties|/financings/\{versionPath\}/contracts/\{contractId\}/warranties|  
|GetFinancingContractPayments|/financings/\{versionPath\}/contracts/\{contractId\}/payments|  
|GetFinancingContractScheduledInstallments|/financings/\{versionPath\}/contracts/\{contractId\}/scheduled-instalments|  
|GetUnarrangedAccountsOverdraftContractsList|/unarranged-accounts-overdraft/\{versionPath\}/contracts| 
|GetUnarrangedAccountsOverdraftContractIdentification|/unarranged-accounts-overdraft/\{versionPath\}/contracts/\{contractId\}| 
|GetUnarrangedAccountsOverdraftContractWarranties|/unarranged-accounts-overdraft/\{versionPath\}/contracts/\{contractId\}/warranties| 
|GetUnarrangedAccountsOverdraftContractPayments|/unarranged-accounts-overdraft/\{versionPath\}/contracts/\{contractId\}/payments| 
|GetUnarrangedAccountsOverdraftContractScheduledInstalments|/unarranged-accounts-overdraft/\{versionPath\}/contracts/\{contractId\}/payments| 
|GetInvoiceFinancingsContractsList|/invoice-financings/\{versionPath\}/contracts| 
|GetInvoiceFinancingsContractIdentification|/invoice-financings/\{versionPath\}/contracts/\{contractId\}| 
|GetInvoiceFinancingsContractWarranties|/invoice-financings/\{versionPath\}/contracts/\{contractId\}/warranties| 
|GetInvoiceFinancingsContractPayments|/invoice-financings/\{versionPath\}/contracts/\{contractId\}/payments| 
|GetInvoiceFinancingsContractScheduledInstalments|/invoice-financings/\{versionPath\}/contracts/\{contractId\}/scheduled-instalments| 
|GetBankFixedIncomesInvestmentsList|/bank-fixed-incomes/\{versionPath\}/investments| 
|GetBankFixedIncomesInvestmentIdentification|/bank-fixed-incomes/\{versionPath\}/investments/\{investmentId\}| 
|GetBankFixedIncomesInvestmentBalances|/bank-fixed-incomes/\{versionPath\}/investments/\{investmentId\}/balances| 
|GetBankFixedIncomesInvestmentTransactions|/bank-fixed-incomes/\{versionPath\}/investments/\{investmentId\}/transactions| 
|GetBankFixedIncomesInvestmentTransactionsCurrent|/bank-fixed-incomes/\{versionPath\}/investments/\{investmentId\}/transactions-current| 
|GetCreditFixedIncomesInvestmentsList|/credit-fixed-incomes/\{versionPath\}/investments| 
|GetCreditFixedIncomesInvestmentIdentification|/credit-fixed-incomes/\{versionPath\}/investments/\{investmentId\}| 
|GetCreditFixedIncomesInvestmentBalances|/credit-fixed-incomes/\{versionPath\}/investments/\{investmentId\}/balances| 
|GetCreditFixedIncomesInvestmentTransactions|/credit-fixed-incomes/\{versionPath\}/investments/\{investmentId\}/transactions| 
|GetCreditFixedIncomesInvestmentTransactionsCurrent|/credit-fixed-incomes/\{versionPath\}/investments/\{investmentId\}/transactions-current| 
|GetVariableIncomesInvestmentsList|/variable-incomes/\{versionPath\}/investments| 
|GetVariableIncomesInvestmentIdentification|/variable-incomes/\{versionPath\}/investments/\{investmentId\}| 
|GetVariableIncomesInvestmentBalances|/variable-incomes/\{versionPath\}/investments/\{investmentId\}/balances| 
|GetVariableIncomesInvestmentTransactions|/variable-incomes/\{versionPath\}/investments/\{investmentId\}/transactions| 
|GetVariableIncomesInvestmentTransactionsCurrent|/variable-incomes/\{versionPath\}/investments/\{investmentId\}/transactions-current| 
|GetVariableIncomesBrokerNoteDetails|/variable-incomes/\{versionPath\}/broker-notes/\{brokerNoteId\}| 
|GetTreasureTitlesInvestmentsList|/treasure-titles/\{versionPath\}/investments| 
|GetTreasureTitlesInvestmentIdentification|/treasure-titles/\{versionPath\}/investments/\{investmentId\}| 
|GetTreasureTitlesInvestmentBalances|/treasure-titles/\{versionPath\}/investments/\{investmentId\}/balances| 
|GetTreasureTitlesInvestmentTransactions|/treasure-titles/\{versionPath\}/investments/\{investmentId\}/transactions| 
|GetTreasureTitlesInvestmentTransactionsCurrent|/treasure-titles/\{versionPath\}/investments/\{investmentId\}/transactions-current| 
|GetFundsInvestmentsList|/funds/\{versionPath\}/investments| 
|GetFundsInvestmentIdentification|/funds/\{versionPath\}/investments/\{investmentId\}| 
|GetFundsInvestmentBalances|/funds/\{versionPath\}/investments/\{investmentId\}/balances| 
|GetFundsInvestmentTransactions|/funds/\{versionPath\}/investments/\{investmentId\}/transactions| 
|GetFundsInvestmentTransactionsCurrent|/funds/\{versionPath\}/investments/\{investmentId\}/transactions-current| 
|GetExchangesOperationsList|/exchanges/\{versionPath\}/operations| 
|GetExchangesOperationIdentification|/exchanges/\{versionPath\}/operations/\{operationId\}| 
|GetExchangesOperationEvents|/exchanges/\{versionPath\}/operations/\{operationId\}/events| 

The versionPath is the Open Finance version of the API.

When the request status is ERROR, there will be an errorCode and an errorDescription, which can be:
    

| Error Code | Error Description |
|----------|:-------------|
|PBE1411|Unexpected Http Status Code|
|PBE1412|Request timed out|
|PBE1413|Malformed Response|
|PBE1414|Wrong Status|
|PIE002|Error calling internal api|

You can sign this webhook in the logged area of this portal or via [API](https://developer.btgpactual.com/doccm#tag/Webhook), with the entity ```ObkRecData```. You can also configure the security validation method for the requests, which can be either ```mTLS Certificate``` or ```Hash Signature (HMAC SHA256 Hash)```.

For more information on the security validation methods, check the ```AUTHORIZATIONS``` section below.

For more information on webhooks, see the [Webhook Documentation](https://developer.btgpactual.com/doccm#tag/Webhook).

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
